ygData.subject: Re: The bum and the hole....
ygData.msgSnippet: The other bots watch curiously, the two bots were fithting each other completely oblivious to thier presence. One of the four opened a link to the leader

The other bots watch curiously, the two bots were fithting each other
completely oblivious to thier presence. One of the four opened a link to the
leader "Should we attack?" it asked thinking about taking advantage of the
situation.

"Hold your ground and let them waste thier energy, one injured bot will be
easier to take out than two." THe leader flew lower and landed on a
buildings ledge. "I'll give you the signal, wait until then."

Taking notes on the battle the four noted the big bots missle launchers, the
missles could easily be refitted to fit them. The prizes of the attack were
looking better and better.

The ground collapsed beneath the monsterbot causing it to drop below ground,
it appeared the drunken bot had won.

Suddenly rubble burst from the hole, the monsterbot presenting himself back
into the battle.

Shortly later the fight seemed over, the leader of the four observers was
ready to make his move. A shadow passed overhead as Grimlock flew overhead.
Again he had to delay his attack. The other Dinobots arrived on the scene
making the prize that much juicier. He didn't want to wait any longer.
"Cybrats move, pick your targets and make every shot count." being the only
flyer he flew down toward Grimlock fireing two piercing missles at the
Dinobot leader. If successfull the missles would pierce the Dinobots armor
and explode from the inside.

Arty rolled in from behind fireing two sidewinders at Slag and four shots
from his cannon at Repugnus.

Dogged launched a taser line at the bum, then tossed a smoke grenade into
the middle of the action to blind the prey. The Cybrats had optical implants
designed to see through the smoke, Most other senses would be blind.

Brandings flamethrowers flipped onto her arms launching flames at the blind
side of Repugnus. her optics locked on, her aim was infalible, her ability
to down the target was out of necessity, there was nothing personal about
the battle the Cybrats would have attacked any other factions the same way.

From: Jordan Guthrie <gunthers8@...>

Sent: Saturday, May 26, 2001 2:25 PM
Subject: Re: The bum and the hole....
